name: We Got Married
overview: We Got Married is a South Korean reality variety show, one segment of the Sunday Sunday Night program. First broadcast in 2008, the show pairs up Korean celebrities to show what life would be like if they were married. Each week, couples are assigned missions to complete, with candid interviews of the participants to reveal their thoughts and feelings.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview:
We Got Married (Season 1) is the first season of We Got Married, a popular reality South Korean variety show and a segment of the Sunday Sunday Night program. First broadcast in 2008, the show pairs up Korean celebrities to show what life would be like if they were married. Each week, couples are assigned missions to complete, with candid interviews of the participants to reveal their thoughts and feelings.

With a new format and slightly different couples, newlyweds are given a mission to complete each week. As during the special pilot episode, interviewed participants provide a unique perspective on the ongoing relationship conflicts and developments. All of the recorded material is then played in front of the participants, MCs, and audience who add commentary or clarification.

Beginning with a Lunar New Year's Special in 2009 with three new couples, a new format is introduced into the show, first forecasted through the addition of Kangin and Lee Yoon Ji. Each couple is given a concept to portray; in Kangin and Lee Yoon Ji's case, a college couple living with a limited income. The show now consists of more special effects and editing in order to show each couple in a set atmosphere and theme.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview:
We Got Married (Season 2) is the second season of We Got Married, a popular reality South Korean variety show and a segment of the Sunday Sunday Night program. First broadcast in 2008, the show pairs up Korean celebrities to show what life would be like if they were married. Each week, couples are assigned missions to complete, with candid interviews of the participants to reveal their thoughts and feelings.

With a new format and slightly different couples, newlyweds are given a mission to complete each week. As during the special pilot episode, interviewed participants provide a unique perspective on the ongoing relationship conflicts and developments. All of the recorded material is then played in front of the participants, MCs, and audience who add commentary or clarification.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: We Got Married (Season 3) is season the third season of South Korean Munhwa Broadcasting Corporation We Got Married, reality variety show and a segment of the Sunday Sunday Night program. First broadcast in 2008, the show pairs up Korean celebrities to show what life would be like if they were married. Each week, couples are assigned missions to complete, with candid interviews of the participants to reveal their thoughts and feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: All newlyweds are to "Move into new house" on White Day, 14 March. While the couples prepare their new houses together, two of the grooms (Crown J & Andy) prepare surprises for this special day.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The continuation of last week's mission. Hyung Don tries to make ‘Star’ surprise for Saori but the result doesn't come out as he wished. Alex sings "Like a Child" for Shinae after preparing several romantic events.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: On the next day, each couple wakes up and prepare breakfast. After 10 days, they are then given a new mission: "Today is the day to exercise together with your partner". Andy and Solbi play pool, Crown J and In Young 'finger' exercise, Alex and Shinae boxing, and Hyung Don and Saori go in-line skating.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The continuation of last week's mission. While each couple enjoy doing exercises together, Hyung Don and Saori couple get into another conflict. The conflict brings up an argument between people in the recording studio.

Each week, couples are assigned missions to complete, with candid interviews of the participants to reveal their thoughts and feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 133
episodes.overview: Leeteuk and Kang So-ra camping. Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah move into the We Got Married (WGM) village. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 134
episodes.overview: Leeteuk and Kang So-ra's virtual marriage concludes. Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah start their married life officially. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa go out for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 135
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah cooking battle. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa move into WGM village. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 136
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah wash car and do Gangnam Style dance. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa prepare a birthday feast. Oh Yeon-seo visit MBLAQ Lee Joon's dorm.

episodes.name: Episode 137
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah's English lessons. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa celebrate Kwanghee's birthday. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo move in.

episodes.name: Episode 138
episodes.overview: WGM village meeting

episodes.name: Episode 139
episodes.overview: WGM village meeting

episodes.name: Episode140
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah's Thanksgiving party. Han Sun-hwa's birthday. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo plant vegetables and establish ground rules.

episodes.name: Episode 141
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah harvest chestnuts. Han Sun-hwa's birthday. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo go to the beach.

episodes.name: Episode 142
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah go to the hospital. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa do skincare together. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo spend time at the beach.

episodes.name: Episode 143
episodes.overview: WGM village kimchi making event. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa go shopping. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo go to the market together.

episodes.name: Episode 144
episodes.overview: WGM village kimchi-making event. Halloween amusement park party.

episodes.name: Episode 145
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah's Korean lesson. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa visit murals. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo tour Han river at night.

episodes.name: Episode 146
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah go camping. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa take care of chicken. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo clean rooms.

episodes.name: Episode 147
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah go camping. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa's feast preparations. Lee Joon mom visits, teaches aegyo.

episodes.name: Episode 148
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah go camping. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa welcomes feast guests. Lee Joon mom visits.

episodes.name: Episode 149
episodes.overview: Hawaii vacation of three couples.

episodes.name: Episode 150
episodes.overview: Hawaii vacation of three couples.

episodes.name: Episode 151
episodes.overview: First night of honeymoon.

episodes.name: Episode 152
episodes.overview: The three couples learn dancing.

episodes.name: Episode 153
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah's birthday preparations. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa 's new years wishing bell. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo learn cooking.

episodes.name: Episode 154
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah's birthday preparations. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa play with tarot cards and make fish soup. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo meet with MBLAQ.

episodes.name: Episode 155
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah go to a club. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa do hair and makeup together. Lee Joon and Oh Yeon-seo's virtual marriage concludes.

episodes.name: Episode 156
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah's traditional wedding. Hwang Kwang-hee's parents come visit. Jinwoon and Go Joon-hee meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 157
episodes.overview: Hwang Kwang-hee's parents come visit. Jinwoon and Go Joon-hee meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 158
episodes.overview: Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa work out together. Jinwoon and Go Joon-hee cook together.

episodes.name: Episode 159
episodes.overview: Julien Kang and Yoon Se-ah's virtual marriage concludes. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa make perfume together. Jinwoon and Go Joon-hee participate cooking and driving.

episodes.name: Episode 160
episodes.overview: Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa babysit. The real-life couple of 11 years, Jung-in and Jo Jung-chi, start their virtual marriage. Jinwoon and Go Joon-hee go fencing.

episodes.name: Episode 161
episodes.overview: Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa babysit. Jinwoon and Go Joon-hee perform at a show together. Jung-in and Jung-chi must find each other using the memories of their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 162
episodes.overview: Jung-in and Jung-chi visit an amusement park for the very first time. Hwang Kwang-hee and Han Sun-hwa babysit. Go Joon-hee visits Jinwoon's job.

episodes.name: Episode 163
episodes.overview: Kwanghee, Sunhwa, Jinwoon and Joon-hee go on a camping double date. Jung-chi and Jung-in receive a mission to move into the 'We Got Married' village.

episodes.name: Episode 164
episodes.overview: All three couples go on an outing together and compete to see which couple gets to move into the house with a pool.

episodes.name: Episode 165
episodes.overview: Jung-in and Jung-chi start setting up their new home. Kwanghee and Sunhwa reflect on their virtual marriage. Joon-hee visits Jinwoon's family.

episodes.name: Episode 166
episodes.overview: Jung-chi and Jung-in host a housewarming party. Kwanghee and Sunhwa's virtual marriage concludes. Jinwoon and Joon-hee start gardening.

episodes.name: Episode 167
episodes.overview: Jung-in and Jung-chi's housewarming party continues. Jinwoon surprises Joon-hee at the airport. Lee Tae-min and Son Na-eun meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 168
episodes.overview: Jung-chi and Jung-in get medical examinations. Jinwoon and Joon-hee try out sky yoga together. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun's first meeting continues as they spend time together on a boat out in the ocean.

episodes.name: Episode 169
episodes.overview: Jung-chi tries to cheer up Jung-in after they receive her medical examination results. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun visit their high school. Joon-hee prepares a surprise birthday party for Jinwoon.

episodes.name: Episode 170
episodes.overview: Jung-in and Jung-chi prepare for a commercial shoot. Jinwoon has his surprise birthday party. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun go on a date in Myeong-dong.

episodes.name: Episode 171
episodes.overview: Jung-in's mother visits Jung-in and Jung-chi. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun move into their home. Jinwoon and Joon-hee celebrate their 100th day together with a honeymoon in Japan.

episodes.name: Episode 172
episodes.overview: Jung-chi, Jung-in and their friends visit a temple in the mountains. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun celebrate his Coming of Age Day. Jinwoon and Joon-hee spend their first night together.

episodes.name: Episode 173
episodes.overview: Jung-in and Jung-chi's temple visit continues. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun continue to celebrate his Coming of Age Day. Jinwoon and Joon-hee continue their honeymoon in Japan.

episodes.name: Episode 174
episodes.overview: Jung-in and Jung-chi's temple visit continues. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun host a housewarming party. Jinwoon and Joon-hee have a wedding in Japan.

episodes.name: Episode 175
episodes.overview: Jung-in and Jung-chi work together to create couple rings. Lee Tae-min's Coming of Age Day party continues. He and Na-eun are later given a mission to meet the other couples.

episodes.name: Episode 176
episodes.overview: The three couples meet together, initiating a couples photoshoot competition.

episodes.name: Episode 177
episodes.overview: The couples prepare for their photoshoots.

episodes.name: Episode 178
episodes.overview: The couples have their own photoshoots then finish by joining together.

episodes.name: Episode 179
episodes.overview: The results of the photoshoot competition are revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 180
episodes.overview: Jung-chi and Jung-in take a trip to Ulleungdo. Lee Tae-min will be leaving for Japan for a month so he and Na-eun spend time together. Jinwoon and Joon-hee work on a song together.

episodes.name: Episode 181
episodes.overview: Jung-chi and Jung-in's Ulleungdo trip continues. Jinwoon and Joon-hee work on the lyrics of their song. Lee Tae-min looks for a gift and prepares a surprise for Na-eun during their time apart.

episodes.name: Episode 182
episodes.overview: Jung-chi and Jung-in visit a water park for the first time. Jinwoon and Joon-hee go on a fashion date. Lee Tae-min's surprise for Na-eun and A Pink is revealed.

episodes.name: Episode 183
episodes.overview: Jung-chi and Jung-in are given a mission to clean up their home. They then have a shaved ice competition. Jinwoon and Joon-hee go horseback riding. Lee Tae-min's surprise for Na-eun and A Pink continues.

episodes.name: Episode 184
episodes.overview: Jinwoon and Joon-hee search for clams and play around in the mudflats. Na-eun gives Lee Tae-min a birthday surprise. Jung-chi gets a hair makeover. Key and Eunji have a blind date.

episodes.name: Episode 185
episodes.overview: Jinwoon gives Joon-hee a surprise birthday party. Lee Tae-min, Na-eun, Key and Eunji have a double date at an amusement park. Jung-chi and Jung-in reflect on their time together and work on a time capsule for their memories.

episodes.name: Episode 186
episodes.overview: Jung-chi and Jung-in continue reflecting on their memories as their virtual marriage concludes. Lee Tae-min, Na-eun, Key and Eunji's double date continues. Jinwoon and Joon-hee's virtual marriage concludes.

episodes.name: Episode 187
episodes.overview: Jung Joon-young and Jung Yu-mi meet for the first time. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun play in the water then have a sincere chat over a couple of drinks. Yoonhan and Lee So-yeon have their first meeting.

episodes.name: Episode 188
episodes.overview: Yu-mi pays a visit to Joon-young's house. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun are visited by most of the SHINee members along with Eunji for Chuseok. Yoonhan and So-yeon have a romantic meal that he prepared.

episodes.name: Episode 189
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun's Chuseok celebration with their members continues. Joon-young and Yu-mi move into their new home. Yoonhan and So-yeon go on a romantic picnic date.

episodes.name: Episode 190
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun go on a camping trip where they harvest grapes for wine. Joon-young and Yu-mi continue settling into their new home. Yoonhan meets So-yeons sister.

episodes.name: Episode 191
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon move into their new home. Joon-young and Yu-mi write their couple rules. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun's camping trip continues.

episodes.name: Episode 192
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun have a date at Heyri Art Village. Joon-young teaches Yu-mi how to ride a skateboard. Yoonhan and So-yeon clean their house then eat a meal prepared by So-yeon.

episodes.name: Episode 193
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun continue their date in Heyri Art Village. Yu-mi joins Joon-young at the filming of his music video. Yoonhan and So-yeon walk on the red carpet of the '18th Busan International Film Festival' together.

episodes.name: Episode 194
episodes.overview: Na-eun prepares a surprise for Lee Tae-min in honor of SHINee's comeback. Joon-young performs at a road-side concert with the support of Yu-mi. So-yeon and Yoonhan go for couple counseling. After giving Yoonhan a birthday surprise, they have a bridal shower with So-yeon's friends.

episodes.name: Episode 195
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun visit a recording studio after SHINee's comeback. Joon-young and Yu-mi practice for a marathon. So-yeon's bridal shower with her friends continues. Yoonhan and So-yeon also try making pottery.

episodes.name: Episode 196
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun enjoy a date on the beach in Jeju Island. Joon-young and Yu-mi continue practicing for the marathon then spend time together at home. Yoonhan and So-yeon have their wedding photoshoot.

episodes.name: Episode 197
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun return to the first place they met on Jeju Island to celebrate their 200th day together. Joon-young and Yu-mi go on a trip to Japan. Yoonhan and So-yeon's wedding photoshoot continues.

episodes.name: Episode 198
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun have a traditional wedding ceremony. Joon-young and Yu-mi's Japan trip continues. Yoonhan and So-yeon check their skin condition, receive massages and learn how to dance the tango.

episodes.name: Episode 199
episodes.overview: Yoonhan has a romantic surprise for So-yeon. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun's traditional wedding continues. Joon-young and Yu-mi continue their trip in Japan.

episodes.name: Episode 200
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon have a wedding by themselves in Jeju Island. Lee Tae-min and Na-eun open up a joint bank account and visit an amusement park. Continuing their Japan trip, Joon-young and Yu-mi visit a goya farm and restaurant.

episodes.name: Episode 201
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun celebrate Christmas together by visiting a ski resort. Joon-young and Yu-mi receive a mission to host a Christmas party with friends. Yoonhan and So-yeon spend the day together after their wedding ceremony.

episodes.name: Episode 202
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun continue their date at the ski resort. Joon-young and Yu-mi have their Christmas party with their friends. Yoonhan and So-yeon decorate their house.

episodes.name: Episode 203
episodes.overview: Lee Tae-min and Na-eun's virtual marriage concludes. Joon-young and Yu-mi go to couples counseling. Yoonhan and So-yeon continue to settle into their home as they go shopping and cook together.

episodes.name: Episode 204
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon go on a date in Myeong-dong. Yu-mi meets Joon-young's brother. Jang Woo-young and Park Se-young meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 205
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon record a duet song. Yu-mi treats Joon-young to an expensive meal while they argue over who won the better award. Jang Woo-young and Se-young's first meeting continues.

episodes.name: Episode 206
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon invite Joon-young and Yu-mi to their home as a housewarming party. Jang Woo-young and Se-young travel to Chuncheon for their honeymoon.

episodes.name: Episode 207
episodes.overview: Yoonhan, So-yeon, Joon-young and Yu-mi continue to spend time together until they switch houses with each other. Jang Woo-young and Se-young go ice fishing, sledding and visit a jewelry store in Chuncheon.

episodes.name: Episode 208
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi go on a trip to Jeju Island. Yoonhan and So-yeon have a date in a bookstore then they go to an art museum. Jang Woo-young and Se-young go furniture shopping.

episodes.name: Episode 209
episodes.overview: Yu-mi and Joon-young's Jeju Island trip continues. Jang Woo-young and Se-young make furniture for their home.

episodes.name: Episode 210
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi celebrate both their birthdays in a joint party. Yoonhan and So-yeon enjoy a date in a cafe followed by an open-air spa. Jang Woo-young and Se-young continue shopping for furniture and decorations for their home.

episodes.name: Episode 211
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon try out a session of couples yoga together. Yu-mi's mother pays a visit to the couple's home. Jang Woo-young and Se-young settle into their home and cook their first meal together.

episodes.name: Episode 212
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon have a date in Hongdae. Yu-mi's mother's visit continues and then the couple prepares for their wedding photoshoot. Jang Woo-young and Se-young get driving lessons from Jinwoon then all three of them spend some time together.

episodes.name: Episode 213
episodes.overview: Yoonhan and So-yeon's virtual marriage concludes. Joon-young and Yu-mi have their wedding photoshoot. Jang Woo-young and Se-young have a barbecue as their housewarming party.

episodes.name: Episode 214
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi continue their wedding photoshoot. Jang Woo-young and Se-young watch a movie in bed after their barbecue. They also visit a recording studio to record a duet. Namkoong Min and Hong Jin-young meet for the first time.

episodes.name: Episode 215
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi's wedding album arrives. Min and Jin-young's first meeting continues as they have a date in Daehangno.

episodes.name: Episode 216
episodes.overview: Jang Woo-young and Se-young go to a gym to workout together. Joon-young and Yu-mi visit a traditional village center. Min and Jin-young begin searching for a house.

episodes.name: Episode 217
episodes.overview: Joon-young surprises Yu-mi with a visit to her drama's set. Jang Woo-young and Se-young go to an amusement park. Min and Jin-young meet with Jin-young's friends.

episodes.name: Episode 218
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi spend time with his friends at a basketball court. Se-young meets Jang Woo-young's friends and then mother during their trip in Busan. Min, Jin-young, Jang Woo-young and Se-young visit the 'Radio Star' set.

episodes.name: Episode 219
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi visit a herb farm and then enjoy a variety of teas. Jang Woo-young and Se-young go to Singapore for their honeymoon. Min and Jin-young go to Saipan for their honeymoon.

episodes.name: Episode 220
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi go on a date along with her family's dog. Jang Woo-young and Se-young have a wedding ceremony during their honeymoon. Min and Jin-young continue their honeymoon and are given a mission to prepare for their wedding.

episodes.name: Episode 221
episodes.overview: Jang Woo-young and Se-young go on a date at an aquarium. Min and Jin-young have their wedding ceremony on a yacht.

episodes.name: Episode 222
episodes.overview: Joon-young and Yu-mi's virtual marriage concludes. Se-young prepares a surprise birthday meal for Jang Woo-young. Min temporarily moves into Jin-young's home.

episodes.name: Episode 223
episodes.overview: Hong Jong-hyun and Yura meet for the first time. Jang Woo-young and Se-young go to the studio to record their duet. They receive a mission to have a wedding reception with their friends. Min and Jin-young go shopping for ingredients then prepare their first meal together.

episodes.name: Episode 224
episodes.overview: Jong-hyun and Yura spend their honeymoon camping in an RV. Jang Woo-young and Se-young continue spending time with their friends. They receive a mission to go on a camping trip. Jin-young meets Min's friends.

episodes.name: Episode 225
episodes.overview: Jong-hyun and Yura continue their honeymoon. Jang Woo-young and Se-young continue their camping trip. The gathering with Min's friends continues.

episodes.name: Episode 226
episodes.overview: All couples prepare food for the competition.

episodes.name: Episode 227
episodes.overview: Jang Woo-young and Se-young promote their song. Jong-hyun and Yura move into their new home. Min and Jin-young go on farming date.

episodes.name: Episode 228
episodes.overview: Jang Woo-young and Se-young continue to promote their song. Jong-hyun and Yura prepare to move into their new home. Min and Jin-young celebrate their 100th day together.

episodes.name: Episode 229
episodes.overview: Jang Woo-young and Se-young wash blankets together and practice their song's choreography. Jong-hyun and Yura finish unpacking and settle into their home. Min and Jin-young have a romantic dinner for their 100th day together.

episodes.name: Episode 230
episodes.overview: Jang Woo-young and Se-young go hiking. Jong-hyun and Yura explore their new neighborhood. Min, Jin-young, Jong-hyun and Yura compete with each other in couple games.

episodes.name: Episode 293
episodes.overview: Min-seok and Ye-won go on a dinner date. Sungjae and Joy continue their meeting with Amber and Kangin. Si-yang and So-yeon's housewarming party continues.

episodes.name: Episode 294
episodes.overview: Min-seok and Ye-won go rollerskating and have a picnic. Sungjae and Joy go to Han River for a date. Si-yang and So-yeon go to a baseball game.

episodes.name: Episode 295
episodes.overview: Min-seok and Ye-won visit the recording studio to record their song. Sungjae and Joy travel to their wedding ceremony along with the BTOB and Red Velvet members. Si-yang and So-yeon go on a camping trip.

episodes.name: Episode 296
episodes.overview: Min-seok and Ye-won record their song. Sungjae and Joy have their wedding ceremony. Si-yang and So-yeon continue their camping trip.

episodes.name: Episode 297
episodes.overview: Min-seok and Ye-won have a date inside of a cave. Sungjae and Joy enjoy the amusement park along with the other BTOB and Red Velvet members. Si-yang surprises So-yeon with events for her birthday.
